# datapower_webb2bviewer (Resource)

B2B viewer management service (`default` domain only)
  - CLI Alias: `b2b-viewer-mgmt`

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "datapower_webb2bviewer" "test" {
  local_port    = 9091
  idle_timeout  = 600
  local_address = "0.0.0.0"
}
```
